name: Limited Mobility & Wheelchair Users
description: Information and resources about individuals who use wheelchairs or have limited mobility. Find clothing designed for seated positioning, easy transfers, and independent dressing.

name: Arthritis & Limited Dexterity
description: Adaptive clothing solutions for those with arthritis, reduced hand strength, or limited fine motor skills. Discover magnetic closures, elastic waistbands, and easy-grip features.

name: Sensory Processing Disorders
description: Resources for individuals with sensory sensitivities including autism spectrum disorders. Find tagless, seamless, and soft-fabric clothing options that minimize irritation.

name: Visual Impairments
description: Clothing solutions for individuals who are blind or have low vision. Explore tactile markers, high-contrast designs, and organizational systems for easy wardrobe management.

name: Stroke & Hemiplegia
description: Adaptive fashion for individuals recovering from stroke or living with one-sided paralysis. Find one-handed dressing solutions and specially designed garments.

name: Post-Surgery & Recovery
description: Temporary and permanent solutions for post-operative care. Discover front-opening garments, easy-access designs, and comfortable recovery wear.
